text.div:
Neonatal Severe Neurological Complications

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    126941005 Subdural intracranial hemorrhage due to birth trauma (disorder)
    15984991000119103 Spontaneous intracerebral hemorrhage in neonate (disorder)
    15985111000119106 Spontaneous subarachnoid hemorrhage in neonate (disorder)
    179924009 Cardiac arrest in fetus OR newborn (disorder)
    180906006 Neonatal cardiac arrest (disorder)
    181869007 Neonatal cardiorespiratory arrest (disorder)
    194091000119102 Neonatal cerebral hematoma due to birth trauma (disorder)
    206191000 Local intracranial subdural hematoma due to birth trauma (disorder)
    206194008 Cerebral hematoma in fetus or newborn (disorder)
    206196005 Cerebral hemorrhage due to birth injury (disorder)
    206395003 Intraventricular (nontraumatic) hemorrhage, grade 1, of fetus and newborn (disorder)
    206396002 Intraventricular (nontraumatic) hemorrhage, grade 2, of fetus and newborn (disorder)
    206397006 Intraventricular (nontraumatic) hemorrhage, grade 3, of fetus and newborn (disorder)
    206398001 Intraventricular hemorrhage due to birth injury (disorder)
    206417009 Intracranial nontraumatic hemorrhage of fetus and newborn (disorder)
    206419007 Cerebellar (nontraumatic) and posterior fossa hemorrhage of fetus and newborn (disorder)
    240313004 Intracerebral hemorrhage in fetus or newborn (disorder)
    25004000 Subdural hemorrhage due to intrapartum anoxia AND/OR hypoxia (disorder)
    261808007 Neonatal cerebral hemorrhage (disorder)
    276648002 Intraventricular hemorrhage of prematurity (disorder)
    276652002 Perinatal subependymal hemorrhage with intraventricular and intracerebral extension (disorder)
    288276001 Fetal cerebral hemorrhage (disorder)
    38453000 Cerebral hemorrhage due to intrapartum anoxia or hypoxia (disorder)
    428241007 Ventricular hemorrhage of fetus (disorder)
    43602006 Subdural intracranial hemorrhage in fetus OR newborn (disorder)
    70611002 Perinatal intraventricular hemorrhage (disorder)
    722580004 Fetal or neonatal intraventricular non-traumatic hemorrhage grade 4 (disorder)
    722581000 Fetal or neonatal non-traumatic intraventricular hemorrhage (disorder)
    722582007 Fetal or neonatal intracerebral non-traumatic hemorrhage (disorder)
    722583002 Fetal or neonatal non-traumatic hemorrhage of subarachnoid space of brain (disorder)
    722584008 Fetal or neonatal non-traumatic hemorrhage of subdural space of brain (disorder)
